sentences.en: A Thai artist puts finishing touches on a decorated ostrich eggshell in Bangkok.
sentences.cn: 在泰国曼谷,一名艺术家在一颗彩绘鸵鸟蛋壳上做最后的修饰.

sentences.en: According to Pitcairn, there is 1,800 mgs. of calcium per teaspoon of eggshell powder.
sentences.cn: 根据一些测试, 一茶匙蛋壳粉里, 含有1800毫克的钙.

sentences.en: Chondroitin sulfate was extracted from the eggshell membrane with a method of dilute alkali - enzyme hydrolysis.
sentences.cn: 以蛋壳膜为原料,采用稀碱与酶解相结合的方法提取硫酸软骨素.

sentences.en: Eggshell antique: Soft, bulky paper with a slilghtly dull matt surface, like of an egg shell.
sentences.cn: 蛋壳仿古纸: 软而厚的纸.表面像蛋壳的无光泽和粗糙.

sentences.en: Eggshell soft, egg - shaped full rich, tender meat, sweet - smelling delicious aftertaste.
sentences.cn: 蛋壳柔软 、 蛋形饱满丰富 、 肉质细嫩 、 醇香可口,回味悠长.

sentences.en: Ghosts crowd the young childs fragile eggshell mind.
sentences.cn: 鬼魂围绕着小孩脆弱的思想.

sentences.en: In this paper, eggshell ultrastructure of fowl had been studied by high power scanning microscope.
sentences.cn: 本研究采用高分辨率的扫描电镜观察海赛克斯鸡蛋壳的超微结构,详细分析了其结构模式.

sentences.en: Just as mine Ming - Lee's room was painted soft eggshell white.
sentences.cn: 正如如我的明 - 李的房间是描画的软蛋壳白色的.

sentences.en: The mixed mushroom total of every commercial eggshell polluted is 1423.
sentences.cn: 随机抽检市售鲜鸡蛋每个蛋壳表所污染的杂菌,总数达1423.

sentences.en: The processing of calcium acetate from eggshell was studied.
sentences.cn: 以鸡蛋壳为原料,研究制备醋酸钙的工艺技术.

sentences.en: The walls had been painted an eggshell white.
sentences.cn: 墙面用蛋壳漆刷成了白色。

sentences.en: This eggshell china, pure , white and translucent, has an irresistible charm.
sentences.cn: 这件纯净透明, 洁白无瑕的薄胎瓷器, 魅力无穷.

sentences.en: Through hatching egg by hen, the chicken would break the eggshell and see the world.
sentences.cn: 当一只母鸡孵在蛋上, 小鸡就会在里面慢慢成形,直到最后啄开蛋壳出来.

sentences.en: When God did the same with the eggshell of this red - yoked universe centuries ago.
sentences.cn: 像当初上帝剖开红心蛋一样的宇宙的壳.

trans.tran_en: the hard outside part of a bird’s egg
